mapper.sql: comp_id, comp_name, match_type, create_time, update_time, oper_id
mapper.select:
select
from jc_match_dict where 1=1
and match_type=#{param.matchType}
and ( comp_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') or comp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') )
mapper.update:
update jc_match_dict
comp_name = #{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
match_type = #{matchType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
